column5:
Every movie that I have at one point in my life considered to be my favorite movie, as ranked by my current opinion.

2021: Zodiac
2020: Ferris Bueller, Zodiac
2019: Endgame, Scott Pilgrim, Baby Driver, and Whiplash
2018: Avengers Infinity War and Bohemian Rhapsody
2017: Captain America: Civil War
2016: Captain America: Civil War
2015: Age of Ultron and Jurassic World
2014: Iron Man 3 and Jurassic Park
2013: Jurassic Park and The Incredibles
2012: Cars 2 and The Incredibles
2011: Adventures of Tintin, Parental Guidance, and The Incredibles
2010 and Down: All of the Indiana Jones and Star Wars Movies

These are all to the best of my recollection. I was born in 2003 but I can't remember what was my favorite movie until I was six or seven when my Dad started showing me Indiana Jones and Star Wars. I really enjoyed Thomas the Tank Engine and Little Einstein VHS tapes when I was young, but I can't be bothered to try to figure out which of those is which.
